column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A Chinese man was found dead in factory accommodation at 9pm on March 10
column4: 2019 in Posenchey.------The unidentified victim lived at the factory.------On the night of March 10
column5: a co-worker who shares the room came back and found the door locked. After managing to get inside and found the victim dead in bed.------Police officers arrived and took three Chinese people to the police station with translators.------Police later said the man had his throat cut.
